subject: J2ME Unit preverify fails
msgSnippet: Hello, I am trying to run j2me unit testing using ant build in the eclipse 2.1 IDE. I am using the antenna tasks to compile the application and unit testing
messageBody:
Hello,

I am trying to run j2me unit testing using ant build in the eclipse
2.1 IDE.
I am using the antenna tasks to compile the application and unit
testing code (being just a demo code, it does very little).
i get the folowing build failure:
Preverification failed (result=1)

any help would be appriciated

below is the test class
package test.mypackage;

import mypackage.MyClass;
import j2meunit.framework.*;
public class MyClassTest extends TestCase {
public MyClassTest() {
super();
}
public MyClassTest(String name) {
super(name);
}
public MyClassTest(String testName, TestMethod testMethod) {
super(testName, testMethod);
}
public Test suite() {
TestSuite aSuite = new TestSuite();

aSuite.addTest(new MyClassTest("testGetNum", new
TestMethod()
{ public void run(TestCase tc) {((MyClassTest)
tc).testGetNum(); } }));

return aSuite;
}
public void testGetNum(){
MyClass c = new MyClass(10);
assertEquals("getNum", 10, c.getNum());
}
public static void main(String args[]) {
String[] runnerArgs = new String[]
{"test.mypackage.MyClassTest"};
j2meunit.textui.TestRunner.main(runnerArgs);
}
}
